name: Crazy Deck
description:
A ball. A platform. A few obstacles. But wait! You don't control the ball but you control the platform itself! Play this unique and fun platformer game in which you have to rotate the platform avoid the ball form hitting the obstacles and reach the end. The game is available in three different difficulties.

There is also a dedicated music menu in which you can choose what music you want to be played in the menus and during the game as well.

It may take some skill but if you can finish the game in all three difficulties, You are the Champion.

Don't forget to post your feedback and comment if you have any ideas for future games.
